title: Submitting art for IP?
body:
I have some art I would like to submit for some IP, I get an average of 99.8 IP per game and I would have to play 42.214 games (If I did two games a day on average, it would take me 21.107 days) to get 6300 IP. I would just like some more with some art and I have two questions.
Would I be able to submit for IP or would it only be for RP? Getting 50 RP wouldn't let my buy anything because I only have 30 right now, so I don't have any need for it.
Where would I submit the art? I don't know if I should bother them with a support ticket since I'm sure they have other important things to get to with support tickets.
Thank you!

replies.body:
I would say they miiiiiiiight take it.... but I believe the one-per-lifetime rule would still apply to it, otherwise it would cause spam of trading in art for IP which is not healthy for the game.

I would still say to submit a ticket asking about it or hope that the guy who runs through help and support sweeps by soon again and gives you a heads up about it.
Thank you very much, I will wait to send a ticket just in the off chance that this gets checked and I get other directions.

Unfortunately, IP isn't part of the RP Art tradition, so it's not something we can offer. However, if you play a bunch of ARAMs, you can farm IP pretty damn easily, especially if you end up with champs like Vlad, Hecarim, Lux, Katarina or Malphite. ^.^

Let me know if you have any questions.
